channel.title: Comments on: Book Review: Guban by Abdi Latif Ega
channel.description: Critical Collaboration on the Middle East, South Asia, and Africa

item.title: By: Ger Duany
item.dc:creator: Ger Duany
item.description:
My brother, Abdi,
This is a fantastic noble and more of us is needed, And thank you for this one!.
Cheers, Ger

My brother, Abdi,
